newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Rashid to buy Kwong Yik at 8.80 rgt/shr.
newsitem.headline: Rashid to buy Kwong Yik at 8.80 rgt/shr.

text.p: Malaysian stockbroker Rashid Hussain Bhd on Tuesday announced it will acquire a 75 percent stake in Kwong Yik Bank Bhd at 8.80 ringgit per share.

Abdul Rashid Hussain, chairman of Rashid Hussain, told reporters ahead of a news conference that his company on Tuesday signed an agreement with Kwong Yik's 75-percent equity owner Malayan Banking Bhd for the stake.
"8.80 (ringgit per share)," Abdul Rashid said when asked what was the price his company was paying for the Kwong Yik stake.
At this price, Rashid Hussain will have to pay around 2.16 billion ringgit for the Kwong Yik shares.
No other details were available. Rashid has scheduled a news conference for 0545 GMT.

Rashid is expected to detail the Kwong Yik deal and a "proposed restructuring" involving itself, its 20 percent associate DCB Holdings Bhd's banking unit and Kwong Yik. -- Kuala Lumpur newsroom (603-230 8911)
